Module io.helidon.integrations.vault.cdi

Package io.helidon.integrations.vault.cdi

Vault integration with CDI. Exposes all APIs discovered through InjectionProvider service loader. This is usually the blocking and reactive API for various secret engines and authentication methods.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    VaultCdiExtension
    Implementation of CDI portable extension to add support for Vault into CDI, including injection of Vault, Authentication methods, Secret engines and Sys APIs that are available on classpath.
    VaultName.Literal
    Utility to obtain VaultName instances.
    VaultPath.Literal
    Utility to obtain VaultPath instances.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    VaultName
    Define a named vault instance.
    VaultPath
    Customize the mount path of a secrets engine.
